title: Bug 4974 Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When you press Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue is caused by setting the output location and classpath as two separate operations. Setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974 Set classpath / output location should be offered as one operation, similar to the validation process that checks the classpath and output location together. Also, the error message should be improved to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
